text: (nabiyē!) niyata vaśayenma api minisungē (yahapata) san̆dahāma sampūrṇayenma satyayen piri mema dharmaya oba veta pahaḷa kaḷemu. ebævin kavurun (meya) anugamanaya kara kaṭayutu karannēda, ohuṭama eya hon̆daki. kavurun (eyin) mārgaya værada yannēda, eya ohuṭama napurak vaśayen avasan vanu æta. (nabiyē!) oba ovunva (ṛju mārgayehi yana men bala kara), bērā ganneku nova
